body_html:
Pylint ignores third-party packages for security reason.

To add a package into the whitelist:
> pylint --generate-rcfile > .pylintrc

Open .pylintrc, and add torch into the whitelist:
extension-pkg-whitelist=torch

Reference:
Pylint Error Message: “E1101: Module 'lxml.etree' has no 'strip_tags' member'”
body_text:
Pylint ignores third-party packages for security reason.
To add a package into the whitelist:
> pylint --generate-rcfile > .pylintrc
Open .pylintrc, and add torch into the whitelist:
extension-pkg-whitelist=torch
Reference:
Pylint Error Message: “E1101: Module 'lxml.etree' has no 'strip_tags' member'”
body:
Pylint ignores third-party packages for security reason.

To add a package into the whitelist:
`> pylint --generate-rcfile > .pylintrc`

Open .pylintrc, and add torch into the whitelist:
`extension-pkg-whitelist=torch`

Reference:
[Pylint Error Message: “E1101: Module 'lxml.etree' has no 'strip_tags' member'”](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43280486/pylint-error-message-e1101-module-lxml-etree-has-no-strip-tags-member)
